ImyaTweaks.Title: Modification of the Item Stack Size
ImyaTweaks.Description: You can use the value entries to fine tune your experience.

ModOp.Path: //Asset[Template='GuildhouseItem' or Template='HarborOfficeItem' or Template='TownhallItem' or Template='VehicleItem' or Template='ShipSpecialist' or Template='ActiveItem' or Template='ItemSpecialAction' or Template='CultureItem']/Values/Item

ImyaExpose.Description: Sets the stack size for all items. Notice that for values above 100, the UI might not show the full number, but '99+'. [Default = 99]
